Yes, it's under branches/pjack_settings.  It requires maven2 to build. 
I would characterize the code as stable but untested.  We are working a 
few final features and hope to have a release candidate soon.

-Paul


> I was wondering how/if I could find out the status of the latest
> development going on with Heritrix 2.0. I was perusing around the
> source repository and could not find a reference to the code. Is it
> available to the public yet?
> 
> Is it available in the public repository
> (https://archive-crawler.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/archive-crawler/ 
> <https://archive-crawler.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/archive-crawler/>)?
> 
> Is the trunk the 2.0 stuff?
> 
> Anyway, thanks for the info
> 
> Briggs
